settings.label: Proposer's/Seconder's Section
settings.description: Please continue to the section detailing your proposer and seconder

settings.html_codes: If you have a Proposer and Seconder, enter the details below. If you do not  have a Proposer, please put "SCYC" and SCYC will contact you

settings.label: Proposer's Name

required.message: If no proposer, please put SCYC.

settings.unique_validation_message: This value need to be unique.

attributes.placeholder: Has known applicant for ?? many years

numeric.message: This field must contain numeric value

settings.label: Seconders' Name
settings.unique_validation_message: This value need to be unique.

settings.label: Local Contact Details
settings.description: If you are not local to Abersoch and holiday in the area

settings.label: Helping With Events
settings.description: Are you available to assist with events in one or more of the following  capacities (please select whichever are applicable):

settings.label: Other areas of expertise
settings.description: Like many clubs, SCYC occasionally seeks assistance from members  with specific professional skills or experience. Please tick if you would  be willing to offer to help in one or more of the following areas:

settings.label: Age over 21 on 1st October?
settings.description: All members over the age of 21 are required to agree to Clause 6 of the  Articles of Association (below)

settings.label: Acknowledgement of Clause 6
settings.description:
Clause 6 of the SCYC Memorandum of Association: 

Every Member of the Club undertakes to contribute to the assets of the Club, in the event of the same being wound up while he is a Member, or within one year after he ceases to be a member, for payment of the debts and liabilities of the Club contracted before he ceases to be a member, and of the costs, charges and expenses of winding up, for the adjustment of the rights of the contributories among themselves, such amount as may be required not exceeding £10.00.

If elected to Membership of South Caernarvonshire Yacht Club Ltd (a  Company limited by guarantee, not having a share capital), I undertake to contribute a sum not exceeding £10 (Ten Pounds) if required to do so under the terms of Clause 6 of the Memorandum of Association.

settings.label: Acknowledgement of Rules*
settings.description: I wish to become a Member of South Caernarvonshire Yacht Club and, if  elected, I undertake to conform to the rules and byelaws of the Club and will  undertake to promote its interests.

Thank you for submitting your membership application.

Stacey our Office Manager will process your application and contact you in due course.

Should you have any questions or queries in the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact Stacey in the office on 01758 712338 or email stacey@scyc.co.uk.

We look forward to welcoming you soon!

Many thanks,
The SCYC Team
